text: Kjell-Olof Feldt (18 August 1931 - 8 January 2025) was a Swedish Social Democratic politician. Feldt was Minister of Trade between 1970 until 1975. He was also the Assistant Minister of Finance from 1975 until 1976. Feldt became Minister of Finance by Prime Minister Olof Palme during his time in office. He was born in Holmsund, Sweden. Feldt died on 8 January 2025 in Stockholm, Sweden at the age of 93. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Politicians from Stockholm
title: Kjell-Olof Feldt
